Sentencas: Solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can be used for clean, efficient and environment-friendly energy conversion with a variety of fuels at high temperature (1273 K).
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The high temperature operation accelerates unwanted reactions and creates materials challenges; so, intermediate-temperature SOFCs (IT-SOFCs) have been developed.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Reduction of the operating temperature (between 873-1073 K) requires solid electrolyte materials with higher conductivities.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: In this study, partially substituted ceria as solid electrolyte is experimented systematically for use in solid oxide fuel cells operating below 1073 K (intermediate temperature range).
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Nine compositions namely, CeO2, Ce0.95Gd0.05O2-delta (CGO9505), Ce0.90Gd0.10O2-delta (CGO9010), Ce0.85Gd0.15O2-delta (CGO8515), Ce0.80Gd0.20O2-delta (CGO8020), Ce0.95Sm0.0O2-delta (SDC9505), Ce0.90Sm0.10O2-delta (SDC9010), Ce0.85Sm0.1O2-delta (SDC8515) and Ce0.80Sm0.20O2-delta (SDC8020) were synthesized by Glycine Nitrate (GN) combustion technique and investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The physical properties and the other relevant features of the data obtained are analyzed with a view to use these alternate electrolyte materials in IT-SOFC.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Ceria-Based Electrolytes for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFC)
